full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` GA-YANG 'BOD BYIN RLABS 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @001B (CES PA 'DI NI BKRA SHIS LHUN PO RI KHROD PA DGE SLONG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS KYIS, DBEN GNAS BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS GLING BTZUGS DUS SU, RTEN 'BREL BZOD PAR MOS TE KHU RE CHEN MO'I NGAGS RAM PA BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SLOB MA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
